headline.main: A Western Front: Is Iraq Next?

lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Re ''A Month in a Difficult Battlefield: Assessing U.S. War Strategy'' (front page, Nov. 8): I'm tired and angered about the media's incessant questioning about the length of our mission in Afghanistan and how long the war on terrorism will last. While the war is being covered 24 hours a day, seven days a week on TV, this is not a 30-minute sitcom or a 30-second advertising spot.
abstract: John Goodman letter, commenting on Nov 8 article, scores media's incessant questioning about length of US mission in Afghanistan and how long war on terrorism will last
